original_text: Afterward he brought me again unto the door of the house; and, behold, waters issued out from under the threshold of the house eastward: for the forefront of the house stood toward the east, and the waters came down from under from the right side of the house, at the south side of the altar.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 성전 문에 이르시니 성전의 앞면이 동쪽을 향하였는데 그 문지방 밑에서 물이 나와 동쪽으로 흐르다가 성전 오른쪽 제단 남쪽으로 흘러 내리더라

sentences.original_text: Afterward he brought me again unto the door of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그가 나를 다시 집 문으로 데려왔고

sentences.original_text: waters issued out from under the threshold of the house eastward
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 집 문턱 아래에서 동쪽으로 흘러나왔으니

sentences.original_text: for the forefront of the house stood toward the east
and the waters came down from under from the right side of the house
at the south side of the altar
